<style>
.main-container {
  max-width: 1800px;
  margin-left: auto;
  margin-right: auto;
}

* {
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

/* Create two unequal columns that floats next to each other */
.column {
  float: left;
  padding: 10px;
  height: 300px; /* Should be removed. Only for demonstration */
}

.left {
  width: 25%;
}

.right {
  width: 75%;
}

/* Clear floats after the columns */
.row:after {
  content: "";
  display: table;
  clear: both;
}

.card-header {
  text-align: center;
}
</style>

<div class="card mb-3 row" style="background-color:#F0F0F0">
  <div class="column left">
  <div class="card-header"> <h2> Supporting local equity-informed decision-making in the National Capital Region </h2> </div>
  <div class="card-body">
  <p class="card-text">  We provide <b>actionable data for local-level decision-making</b> by creating new <b>below county-level datasets and measures</b> derived from publicly collectible data sources. We aim to <b>inform equitable and sustainable growth</b> in Virginia and the National Capital Region. </p>
  <h4 class="card-title"> Data - Applications - Tools - Methods </h4>
  </div>
  </div>
  <div class="column right">

    <text x="50%" y="50%" fill="#dee2e6" dy=".3em">Image cap</text>
  </svg>
  </div>
</div>

<div class="card mb-3">
  <div class="card-header"> <h2> What is a Data Commons? </h2> </div>
  <div class="card-body">
  <p class="card-text">  A Data Commons is an open knowledge repository that co-locates data from a variety of sources, builds and curates data insights, and provides tools designed to track issues over time and geography. A Data Commons allows governments and key stakeholders to learn continuously from their own data. </p>
  <h4 class="card-title"> Our Social Impact Data Commons </h4>
  </div>
  </div>
  <div class="card mb-3 row">
  <div class="card text-white bg-primary mb-3 column left" style="width:25%;">
  <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="d-block user-select-none" width="100%" height="200" aria-label="Placeholder: Image cap" focusable="false" role="img" preserveAspectRatio="xMidYMid slice" viewBox="0 0 318 180" style="font-size:1.125rem;text-anchor:middle">
  <rect width="100%" height="100%" fill="#868e96"></rect>
  <text x="50%" y="50%" fill="#dee2e6" dy=".3em">Image cap</text>
  </svg>
  <div class="card-header">provides data, indicators, indicies, case studies, and training </div>
  </div>
  <div class="card text-white bg-primary mb-3 column left" style="width:25%;">
  <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="d-block user-select-none" width="100%" height="200" aria-label="Placeholder: Image cap" focusable="false" role="img" preserveAspectRatio="xMidYMid slice" viewBox="0 0 318 180" style="font-size:1.125rem;text-anchor:middle">
  <rect width="100%" height="100%" fill="#868e96"></rect>
  <text x="50%" y="50%" fill="#dee2e6" dy=".3em">Image cap</text>
  <div class="card-header">analyzes impact from social, economic, and health trends
and major events </div>
  </div>
  <div class="card text-white bg-primary mb-3 column left" style="width:25%;">
  <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="d-block user-select-none" width="100%" height="200" aria-label="Placeholder: Image cap" focusable="false" role="img" preserveAspectRatio="xMidYMid slice" viewBox="0 0 318 180" style="font-size:1.125rem;text-anchor:middle">
  <rect width="100%" height="100%" fill="#868e96"></rect>
  <text x="50%" y="50%" fill="#dee2e6" dy=".3em">Image cap</text>
  <div class="card-header">enables ongoing learning from data </div>
  </div>
  <div class="card text-white bg-primary mb-3 column left" style="width:25%;">
  <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="d-block user-select-none" width="100%" height="200" aria-label="Placeholder: Image cap" focusable="false" role="img" preserveAspectRatio="xMidYMid slice" viewBox="0 0 318 180" style="font-size:1.125rem;text-anchor:middle">

  </div>
</div>
